game.name: Hidden Portals: Chronicles of the Sunbound Collector's Edition
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Uncover the mystery of the Gates in a hidden object adventure with challenging logic puzzles. Explore deserts, temples, and markets where every choice shapes your fate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uncover the mystery of the Gates in a hidden object adventure with challenging logic puzzles. Explore deserts, temples, and markets where every choice shapes your fate.
